data.title: Clarissa S. Williams
data.text:
Clarissa Smith Williams (Eprel 21, 1859 – Maachị 8, 1930) bụ onye isi nke isii nke Relief Society General President of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church) site na 1921 ruo 1928. Williams bụ onye mbụ nwa. afu Utahn ikpe onye-isi-nduzi Otu Enyem-aka

Clarissa Smith na Salt Lake City, Utah Territory, nye Susan West, nyere nke asaa nke ọrịka LDS mkpa George A. Smith [1]

Na 1901, a gwara Williams ka ọ jee ozi dị ka onye nchekwa nke Otu Enyem-aka site na Bathsheba W. Smith, ozi mbụ Smith. [1] Williams jere ozi n’ọkwa a ruo n’afọ 1910, mgbe ọ ịdee onye mbụ nye Onye-isi-nduzi Emmeline B. Wells na onye-isi-nduzi nke otu Relief Society izugbe. Ọ sị n' iyipada a ruo 1921, mgbe a na-egosi ya anyachite Wells dị ka Oga oche mgbe Wells nwụsịrị. N'ihi ahụ ike, Williams ịpụ ya na ike oku ya na 1928 ma Louise Y. Robison nọchiri ya. </link>Williams nwụrụ site [ ] na Salt Lake City [2] wee lie ya n'ili Salt Lake City

Williams lụrụ William N. Williams na July 17, 1877 ma bụrụ nne nke ụmụ iri na otu (gụnyere George Albert, Bathsheba, Lyman, Clarissa, Sarah, Eva, Georgia). [2]

Mbipụta dị na magazin Relief Society

[dezie | dezie ebe o si]
